column4: For ClamAV - What's the terminal command for it? I'm trying to run "man clamav" so I can read the manual yet its saying no entry, yet I have it installed.
bingo! hey, clamav is terminal only, right?
what are some linux virus scanners that have a gui?
why would you need a virus scanner? gnu/linux is virus free. there are like 20 viruses ever created and never any real viruses iin the wild- except on out-of-date linux boxes back in the day.
